title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively. This behavior is unexpected and needs to be addressed.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should remain stable and not flash excessively.
SR:
1. Launch the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames for excessive flashing.
